author: smorgan
title: Karim Benzema ‘hit with fine’ after being pictured illegally picking up an iguana in Martinique
text:
Karim Benzema posted this photo showing him on holiday with friends on the Caribbean island Alamy Martinique is a popular Caribbean island that belongs to France Getty Images Iguanas are an endangered species in Martinique Karim Benzema super goals in training Related stories Classicos Seven Champions League classics to rival Man City and Monaco, including Chelsea vs Liverpool and Manchester United's historic victory in Turin Leip of Faith German football's surprise package RB Leipzig could be BANNED from playing in the Champions League Preview Watford vs West Ham: What time is kick off, what TV channel is it on and what is the latest team news? MIDWEEK MADNESS Why are Man United playing their Europa League tie against Saint Etienne on a Wednesday? TEAM NEWS Saint Etienne vs Manchester United: What is the team news for the Europa League tie? TV TIMES St Etienne vs Manchester United: What TV channel is the Europa League clash on and when is it? DRAGON'S FIRE What is the Chinese Super League? Wayne Rooney wanted, Carlos Tevez signed, the teams, history and former Premier League stars – here’s what we know PREVIEW Saint-Etienne vs Manchester United: When is the Europa League tie and what TV channel is it on? i am legend Iker Casillas and Gianluigi Buffon go head-to-head in Champions League clash between Porto and Juventus mad dog put down Martin Allen sacked by National League big-spenders Eastleigh after just two wins in 14 games in charge Brandt new Julian Brandt is one of the hottest properties in European football, but why are the top clubs chasing him? Jorge dropping Jorge Sampaoli puts Arsenal and Barcelona on red alert as he delays contract talks with Sevilla 
This is the latest court controversy to hit Benzema. 
Last year he was embroiled in a sex tape scandal with France team-mate Mathieu Valbuena.
